message.body: I'll call u in a half hour or so
When is a good time to call?wish Sophie and family a happy Hanukkah from us!
When u get whatsapp just go to contacts in the app and select me.
I will do that after dinner if I have any problems I'll text thanks
Can you call Verizon and ask them if my phone is unlocked? If it is locked ask them to unlock it.
